title: Drinking game for league
body:
First off i hate that i have to preach this, but remember to drink responsibly, nothing is gained by drinking till you do something too stupid.

So as of about a week ago i had made a post on my main account about referrals, because i was wanting to make an account simply for doing drinking games on it, here's that account, and here is the drinking game.

Rules for Random Drunkness
1. Champions must be bought in order of; Cheapest > Expensive AND A>Z IE: Amumu, Annie, Ashe, Garen, Kayle etc.
2. ARAM will be played till 30 (from 6 as i am doing this sober) once i reach 30 ranked will begin (new rules will be implemented if/when this happens).
3. Drinking games work as follows (for ARAM) (swig= half a mouthful, Chug= Full mouthful);
Every bot Friend or Foe: 1 Sip
Ask in all chat "who's not a bot": 1 Swig for each response
Anyone talking not in english: 1 Swig Per response (one per person)
Every kill: 1 Sip
Every Assist: 1 Sip
Every Death: 1 Swig
Triple Kill: 1 Swig
Quadra Kill: 1 Chug (doesn't stack)
Penta Kill: Finish drink, you ain't drunk enough
Every tower dropped Friend or Foe: 1 Swig
Every Inhib dropped: 1 Chug
Every health rune used (by me): 1 Swig
Any AFK's: 1 Swig

1 more level and i will likely be doing a game tonight with these rules.

(Also apparently i can't post this in misc, and the boards seem to think i'm level 1?)
